competitors.name: GitHub
competitors.notes: Focuses on collaboration and community with vast Marketplace of third-party integrations, GitHub Actions for automation, complete cloud-hosted developer platform

competitors.name: Azure DevOps
competitors.notes: Microsoft's collaborative development tool with comprehensive features, core strength in Azure integration, pricing starts at $6/user/month

competitors.name: Bitbucket
competitors.notes: Atlassian product specialized for teams using Jira, repository, security, version control, integrates with Jira and Confluence, starts at $3/user/month

competitors.name: CircleCI
competitors.notes: Popular CI/CD platform and top GitLab competitor

competitors.name: Gitea
competitors.notes: Best self-hosted alternative, free and open source

context: GitLab Inc. is a DevSecOps platform company focused on source code management, CI/CD, and security in single platform. AI-powered DevSecOps with Duo. Security integration.
